text: <@UEC65BQV8> thank you very much for your reply and advice on what you did to work around it.    It would be nice if HubSpot allowed us to output the url parameters needed and let us do the styling with the html email code.
<@UG7S8J18D> Agreed. I think they would have to have some heavy scripting to get the styling inline to be email compliant, which is why they probably just opt for turning it into an image
